name: WWSBABC7
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Get the latest information from WWSB ABC 7 First Alert Weather Sarasota, Florida within Alexa's Flash Briefing.

Enable this Skill, then say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing" or "Alexa, what's in the news" to hear the audio.

Feeds include the latest weather forecast for the Sarasota, Florida area from the WWSB ABC 7 MySuncoast.com Weather team.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
